Articles.Content:
This challenge will be very hard (no joking) go around the kerbol system with only 1 ship. note:If you want a harder challenge do with a modded solar system (not a addon to the kerbol system only an separate star system also even harder only use a used spacecraft)

**RULES** 

**1.No modded spacecrafts**

**2.you may use mechjeb but only on orbiting**

**3.NO CHEATS!**

**4.Do not use other people's ships (No exceptions)**

**5.You can dock other parts to your ship but only on kerbin also you cant use other ships to dock with yours**

**6.You do this in sandbox or hardcore career mode but this is optional**

**7.Do not use any saves or hack! this would be dishonoring**

**1337.1 kerbal only or none** 

**Nightmare mode** 

**No kerbals**

**only robots**

**put one Ã¢â‚¬â€¹SATELLITE IN ORBIT AROUND EACH PLANETS AND A LANDER ON EACH PLANET**

**Go around the sentar system (link included)** 

**Final rule**

**NO mechjeb and orbit assistance** 

**Mission**

**The goal is to go around the solar system and land on each one or put a satellite in orbit around the planet.**

**send me nonphotoshoped pictures of the ship and the map where the satellites or landers** 

**Also can you do the fastest time**

**please time how long it took you go around the kerbol system and return back kerbin safely!**

 **Also upload your ships its not necessary** ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Download for star systems[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/410/Working%20Multiple%20Stars%20with%20Planets](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/410/Working%20Multiple%20Stars%20with%20Planets) 

ATM would be recommended [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-25-Release-4-2-Dec-10-2014-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-25-Release-4-2-Dec-10-2014-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-09T02:14:59Z" title="04/09/2015 02:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 9, 2015</time> by EpicX rocketry gardens.co**
Should be closed,l unoriginal as 30% of the challenges.
